references.paper_title: SMPL: A skinned multi-person linear model
references.reason: This paper introduces the SMPL body model, which is a foundational parametric body model widely used in human pose estimation and 3D human reconstruction.

references.paper_title: 2D human pose estimation: New benchmark and state of the art analysis
references.reason: This paper is one of the early works that provides a new benchmark for human pose estimation.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces ResNet, which is a very popular backbone for image recognition.

references.paper_title: Keep it SMPL: Automatic estimation of 3D human pose and shape from a single image
references.reason: This paper introduces an approach to recover 3D human pose and shape from a single image.

references.paper_title: From skin to skeleton: Towards biomechanically accurate 3D digital humans
references.reason: This paper introduces the SKEL model, which integrates a biomechanical skeleton with the SMPL surface mesh.
